body.name: Tall Nightstands Set of 2 with Charging Station and LED Lights - 47" Tall Bedside Table with Adjustable Bookshelf, Industrial End Table Side Table with Storage Cabinet for Home Office, Grey
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 16 hrs 8 mins
features: Nightstand with Charging Station: Armocity nightstands set of 2 equipped with 3 power outlets and 2 USB ports can charge 5 electronic appliances at the same time. 4.9 ft long electrical cord will not limit your use. It is a great addition for your bedroom and living room.

Night Stand with Smart RGB LED Lights: Our nightstands comes complete with smart RGB LED light strip, provide over 60000 colors & 29 flashing modes. It have CCT mode, built-in mic, music sync and timer functions for convenient daily use. You can use smart APP and remote control to change the color and brightness easily. You can use included LED lighting of nightstand as an indirect source of light as well.

47" Tall Bedside Table with Bookshelf: 47" height tall end table with charging station is suitable for your height bed or slow bed. Adjustable shelf provide 4 levels, you can flexibly adjust the shelf for your needs.

End Table with Storage Cabinet: This night stand for bedrooms set of 2 with bookshelf and storage cabinet provide ample storage space, you can display and store your favorite items, books, family photos, table lamp and other items. You can easily get what you want.
Easy to Install: Come with comprehensible detailed instructions and labeled parts to help you install the tall nightstands easier without taking a long time.

After-sales service: We provide 24 month customer support for our products. If you have any problem with our bedside table set of 2 with led lights, please feel free to contact us, our friendly customer service team will always here for you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Armocity Nightstands Set of 2 with Charging Station and LED Lights, 47" Tall Bedside Table with Adjustable Bookshelf, Industrial End Table Side Table with Storage Cabinet for Home Office, Grey Armocity nightstand is a great addition for your bedroom and living room. Night stands equipped with 3 power outlets and 2 USB ports can charge 5 electronic appliances at the same time. It is suitable for multiple scenes, bedroom, living room, guest room, kid's room, entryway or small spaces. It can be used as a nightstand, end table, sofa side table and bookshelf.

Smart RGB LED Lights Strips: - Come with smart RGB LED light strip, provide over 60000 colors & 29 flashing modes. - It have CCT mode, built-in mic, music sync and timer functions for convenient daily use. - You can use smart APP and remote control to change the color and brightness easily.

Features of Armocity Nightstand with Charging Station and LED Lights 47" Height Tall: - 47" height tall bedside table is suitable for your height bed or slow bed. Adjustable Bookshelf: - Adjustable shelf provide 4 levels, you can flexibly adjust the shelf for your needs. Night Stands with Storage: - Night stand with bookshelf and storage cabinet provide ample storage space, you can display and store your favorite items. Convenient for Your Charging: - 3 power outlets and 2 USB ports can charge 5 electronic devices at the same time. 4.9 ft long electrical cord will not limit your use. Easy to Assemble: - Come with comprehensible detailed instructions and labeled parts to help you install the tall nightstands easier without taking a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the night stans
reviews.reviewText: I am so happy I got these they are really nice looking and so easy to put together..it took about 15mins. For each of them I used a power tool so it was fast on putting them togetherI am going to buy another set of them so worth the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice product
reviews.reviewText: We are very pleased with this set of nightstands. If you take your time building them, they come out very nice. Everything fit together perfectly. They are very sturdy when finished. We loved the extra detail of support built into these. I feel like they were made with thought of long term use. There are inserts that go on the back to keep the backing from bowing out over time. Very nicely made product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was suprised that they are smaller than I imagined. But they are both working quite well. The instructions were a little confusing at first, (99% pictures, not a lot of direction). But once I got going, it wasn't too bad to put together. Both units are beside my bed, and I have found that one remote turns on both unit's lights. That might become annoying for my partner, if I need the light when he's sleeping. So far I really like the night stands. I'll have to look at the instructions that came with the remotes again to see if I can keep them from both turning on at the same time. Once they were put together I was concerned they were going to be too small, but they are not.I would recogmend these for night stands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Assemble
reviews.reviewText: This took around 1 hour to leisurely assemble while watching TV. After assembling many pieces of furniture due to a recent move, that alone made this nightstand worth it's weight in gold.It's exactly as pictured, and isn't super short like most other nightstands. It's nice to have a product meet all of your expectations!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars WOULD NOT RECOMMEND EVER
reviews.reviewText: This was a waste of money and if I didn’t put it together already I would have sent it back. Very much time consuming holes drilled half way but they don’t want u to use a drill so u struggle trying to get the screws in for an example the first step the holes are half way drilled u have to force the stew in there let’s see the top is hanging off not even measured properly it feels cheap just with nice coating Also u will need the following screw driver drill if holes is half way drilled and a alley key DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY I PROMISE YOU PLEASE SKIP THIS ITEM YOU WILL BE DISAPPOINTED THANK YOU HAVE A GREAT DAY! NO I WILL NOT BE DELETING MY REVIEW STANDING 10 TOES ON EVERYTHING I SAID DO NOT BUY- SINCERELY ANGRY CUSTOMER

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for my needs
reviews.reviewText: It’s definitely cheap material but it’s exactly what I was looking for my room. It’s not that big and it fit perfectly next to my gray bed. I like the light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Was a little bit difficult reading the instructions but overall I did well putting it together on my own except when it came to putting the magnet closure on the inside of cabinet door, I'm a single woman and pride myself in being quite capable of doing things, but if there were better instructions I definitely would not have struggled with it. It is dirty and it is pretty but there is not a whole lot of usable surface space due to power strip

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice looking!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to go on either side of our bed. I love the extra cabinet and shelf for storage near the bed.My only issue is that the LED strip it comes with immediately takes up one of your usb charging ports on the shelf instead of being wired into the main power of it.Assembly was not very difficult, but it does get a little irritating near the end simply because things have to be shifting to fit perfectly.Overall I would recommend, it helped fill some empty space in the room and the lights from them let us have a little night light for those times you gotta get outa bed in the middle of the night.
